rulesStrings.li: physical_description_root->Aggressive tones, dense guitar work, and percussive force shape this heavy and intense record.
physical_description_root->Designed to create tension and release, with mixing choices that maximize impact.
r_middle_sentence_1->Massed guitars and crushing rhythms dominate the mix.
r_middle_sentence_2->The arrangements favor impact and relentless momentum.
r_middle_sentence_3->Drum patterns range from galloping to machine-like precision.
r_middle_sentence_4->Vocal textures alternate between guttural force and harsh screams.
r_middle_sentence_5->Lead lines are technical and aggressive in service of tension.
r_middle_sentence_6->The low end is thick and focused to maximize heaviness.
r_middle_sentence->Massed guitars and crushing rhythms dominate the mix.

r_middle_sentence->Vocal textures alternate between guttural force and harsh screams.

r_sound_quality_sentence->The recording quality reads as {QualityAdjective} for its era.
